languages.text: "Служит... богам {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпа{/g}?! Кунрад — еретик? Ох, Войгтвир, пустотная ты крыса..." {n}Абеляр трясет головой.{/n} "Безумие. Не сомневаюсь, восстание на корабле тоже его рук дело?"

traits.locale_text: "Служить... богам {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпа{/g}?! Кунрад — еретик? Ох, Войгтвир, пустотная ты крыса..." {n}Абеляр трясет головой.{/n} "Безумие. Не сомневаюсь, восстание на корабле тоже его рук дело?"

languages.text: "Serving... the gods of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}? Kunrad is a heretic? Oh, Voigtvir, you void rat..." {n}Abelard shakes his head.{/n} "Madness. And this mutiny is likewise his doing, no doubt?"
languages.original_text: "Служит... богам {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпа{/g}?! Кунрад — еретик? Ох, Войгтвир, пустотная ты крыса..." {n}Абеляр трясет головой.{/n} "Безумие. Не сомневаюсь, восстание на корабле тоже его рук дело?"

"Serving... the gods of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}? Kunrad is a heretic? Oh, Voigtvir, you void rat..." {n}Abelard shakes his head.{/n} "Madness. And this mutiny is likewise his doing, no doubt?"

"Serving... the gods of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}? Kunrad is a heretic? Oh, Voigtvir, you void rat..." {n}Abelard shakes his head.{/n} "Madness. And this mutiny is likewise his doing, no doubt?"

languages.text: “他为……{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}的众神服务？昆拉德是个异端分子？噢，维特威尔，这个该死的叛徒……”{n}阿贝拉德摇摇头。{/n}“这简直是疯了。既然如此，这场叛乱肯定也是他策划的吧？”
languages.original_text: "Serving... the gods of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}? Kunrad is a heretic? Oh, Voigtvir, you void rat..." {n}Abelard shakes his head.{/n} "Madness. And this mutiny is likewise his doing, no doubt?"

traits.locale_text: “他为……{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}的众神服务？昆拉德是个异端分子？噢，维特威尔，这个该死的叛徒……”{n}阿贝拉德摇摇头。{/n}“这简直是疯了。既然如此，这场叛乱肯定也是他策划的吧？”

languages.text: «Sirviendo... a los dioses de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}? ¿Que Kunrad es un hereje? Oh, Voigtvir, rata del vacío...». {n}Abelard niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Qué locura. ¿Y por tanto este motín es obra suya, entiendo?».
languages.original_text: "Serving... the gods of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}? Kunrad is a heretic? Oh, Voigtvir, you void rat..." {n}Abelard shakes his head.{/n} "Madness. And this mutiny is likewise his doing, no doubt?"

traits.locale_text: «Sirviendo... a los dioses de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}? ¿Que Kunrad es un hereje? Oh, Voigtvir, rata del vacío...». {n}Abelard niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Qué locura. ¿Y por tanto este motín es obra suya, entiendo?».

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}<歪み>{/g}の神々に…仕えている？クンラッドが異端者ですと？ボイトヴィル、このヴォイドねずみめ…」{n}アベラルドは頭を振る。{/n}「狂ってる。そしてこの反乱も間違いなく彼の仕業だと？」
languages.original_text: "Serving... the gods of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}? Kunrad is a heretic? Oh, Voigtvir, you void rat..." {n}Abelard shakes his head.{/n} "Madness. And this mutiny is likewise his doing, no doubt?"

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}〈歪み〉{/g}の神々に…遣えている？クンラッドが異端者だと？ボイドヴィル、このヴォイドねずみめ…」{n}アベラルドは頭を振る。{/n}「狂ってる。そしてこの反乱も彼の仕業だと言うんだろう？」
「{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}<歪み>{/g}の神々に…仕えている？クンラッドが異端者ですと？ボイトヴィル、このヴォイドねずみめ…」{n}アベラルドは頭を振る。{/n}「狂ってる。そしてこの反乱も間違いなく彼の仕業だと？」

languages.text: « Il sert... les dieux du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} ? Kunrad est un hérétique ? Oh, Voigtvir, espèce de sale rat... C'est de la folie, {n}continue Abélard en secouant la tête.{/n} Et j'imagine qu'il est aussi à l'origine de cette mutinerie ? »
languages.original_text: "Serving... the gods of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}? Kunrad is a heretic? Oh, Voigtvir, you void rat..." {n}Abelard shakes his head.{/n} "Madness. And this mutiny is likewise his doing, no doubt?"

traits.locale_text: « Il sert... les dieux du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} ? Kunrad est un hérétique ? Oh, Voigtvir, espèce de sale rat... C'est de la folie, {n}continue Abélard en secouant la tête.{/n} Et j'imagine qu'il est aussi à l'origine de cette mutinerie ? »

languages.text: "Er dient den Göttern des {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}? Kunrad ist ein Ketzer? Oh, Voigtvir, Ihr Leerenratte ..." {n}Abelard schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Wahnsinn. Und diese Meuterei ist dann zweifellos auch sein Werk?"
languages.original_text: "Serving... the gods of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}? Kunrad is a heretic? Oh, Voigtvir, you void rat..." {n}Abelard shakes his head.{/n} "Madness. And this mutiny is likewise his doing, no doubt?"

traits.locale_text: "Er dient den Göttern des {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}? Kunrad ist ein Ketzer? Oh, Voigtvir, Ihr Leerenratte ..." {n}Abelard schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Wahnsinn. Und diese Meuterei ist dann zweifellos auch sein Werk?"

languages.original_text: "Serving... the gods of the warp? Kunrad is a heretic? Oh, Voigtvir, you void rat..." {n}Abelard shakes his head.{/n} "Madness. And this mutiny is likewise his doing, no doubt?"

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Öteboyut{/g} tanrılarına hizmet etmek mi? Kunrad kâfir mi? Ah Voigtvir ah! Seni uçsuz sıçanı!" {n}Abelard başını sallıyor.{/n} "Delilik. Bu isyan da kesin onun işi, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "Serving... the gods of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}? Kunrad is a heretic? Oh, Voigtvir, you void rat..." {n}Abelard shakes his head.{/n} "Madness. And this mutiny is likewise his doing, no doubt?"
